list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Reduce notebook size by removing excess cells and outputs.
The notebook had redundant code, outputs, and metadata, inflating its size unnecessarily. Removed superfluous cells, streamlined the code, and eliminated saved outputs to improve maintainability and performance. This simplifies the code and makes future updates easier.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Add initial project setup with README, requirements, and notebook
Include a sample Jupyter Notebook, README for project overview, and requirements.txt for dependencies. Also added PyCharm project configuration files to enable proper IDE support and version control setup.

Add YouTube API script, update `sample.ipynb` and configs
Introduced a comprehensive YouTube API script for video and comment data collection. Updated `sample.ipynb` with additional code examples, adjusted project configurations, and excluded the `models` folder in IDE settings. Added a new `TEST.ipynb` for testing purposes.

Optimize YouTube API script and load saved progress
Refactored the YouTube API script to support resuming interrupted data collection by loading previously saved video and comment data. Added safeguards against redundant processing and incremental data saving for improved efficiency and reliability.

Refactor and clean up 01-Youtube_API.ipynb
Removed redundant and verbose code blocks, simplifying logic. Cleaned up unused variables and streamlined video and comment fetching workflows while preserving core functionality.

Refactor and clean up 01-Youtube_API.ipynb
Removed redundant and verbose code blocks, simplifying logic. Cleaned up unused variables and streamlined video and comment fetching workflows while preserving core functionality.Add PyCharm config and optimize YouTube API script
Included PyCharm project configuration files for IDE settings. Refactored the YouTube API script to support resuming interrupted data collection by loading saved progress. Enhanced efficiency with safeguards against redundant processing and incremental data saving.

Refactor: Remove unused YouTube API script
The YouTube API script was removed to clean up unused, outdated code. This improves codebase maintainability by eliminating unnecessary files.

Remove all code and outputs from 01-Youtube_API.ipynb
Cleared the notebook content to start with a clean slate. This includes removing all cells and generated outputs for a lighter and more maintainable base file.

Remove YouTube API code and outputs from notebook
Deleted a large block of code and outputs related to YouTube API usage, including video search, comment fetching, and data saving logic. This simplifies the notebook and likely indicates a shift in focus or a migration of the functionality elsewhere.

Reduce notebook size by removing excess cells and outputs.
The notebook had redundant code, outputs, and metadata, inflating its size unnecessarily. Removed superfluous cells, streamlined the code, and eliminated saved outputs to improve maintainability and performance. This simplifies the code and makes future updates easier.

The notebook contained extensive unused and outdated code sections. These were replaced with a streamlined and updated version for better efficiency and readability. This cleanup reduces clutter and ensures future maintainability.
